main event: A housewife in Richmond, Virginia reported seeing a round orange object in the night sky on August 7, 1956.
interesting points: The sighting was recorded as a ground radar observation., The weather was clear with a slight breeze and a temperature of 82 degrees., The report was classified and marked for attention by various intelligence offices., The observation took place at around 22:25 at night., No photographs were available with the report.
sighted object: round orange object in the sky
